K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:289a-25: drang stong chen po bdun dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:289b-17: rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:289b-19: sred med kyi bu g-yog dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:289b-23: tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:289b-26: shing gseb kyi lha drug cu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:289b-27: sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:289b-30: rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:289b-31: rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:289b-34: gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:289b-35: de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:289b-37: dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:290a-18: gnam sa'i lha thams cad dang yang thabs cig go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:290a-19: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:290a-20: shin tu bskor; sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:290a-21: shin tu yongs su mthar phyin /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:290b-2: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:290b-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:290b-6: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:290b-7: ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad ni; bcom /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:290b-12: ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu gsal /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:290b-22: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:290b-26: rin po che rdo rje'i padma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri la ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:291a-2: ke ke ru chen po dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:291b-0: 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams @291b 'di snang bas gsal bar byas par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:291b-1: gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des gsal bar snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:291b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang seng+ge'i khri du ma bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang rnams na chos ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:291b-3: nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:291b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang thabs cig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:291b-16: lto 'phye chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:291b-24: smyon pa rnams ni; dran pa rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:291b-29: sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292a-2: yud tsam de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292a-3: yi dvags kyi skye gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292a-4: gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyis ming yang mi grags par gyur to; ;'jig rten gyi bar gang dag mun pa mun nag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292a-5: mun pa mun nag chen por 'dug pa de dag thams cad gsal bar snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292a-6: der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292a-7: sems can gzhan 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292a-8: de nas sems can de dag thams cad kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi dga' ba thob ste mchog gis tshim par gyur nas kun tu bltas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ste de dag gis gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de mthong nas de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292a-10: skyabs su dong ma thag tu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bdag son pa snyam du shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292a-11: snang ba des bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292a-13: kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par kun tu snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-0: bdud kyi ris @292b kyi lha de dag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i sgrar du zhing skrag nas byer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-1: bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po rnyi rnyi por gyur cing lus rdul nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-3: bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-5: kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-6: dge sbyong go'u ma ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na chos bstan pa 'di la ltos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-9: phyogs gang na gnas su gtol med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-10: longs la dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i gan du dong ste bdud kyi yul 'di thal bar byas par ma gyur gyi bar du gzhom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-11: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-12: bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis rje bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas rang rang gi gnas su dong ste lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-13: lus la go cha sna tshogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-16: mche ba mi bzad par 'jigs su rung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-17: bzhin mi sdug par bsgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:292b-20: skra kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba dag skad cig de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas bdud sdig can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293a-1: la ji tsam du dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas ba de ci nas kyang phyis bdag cag gi yul du gnod pa cung zad kyang mi bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293a-3: bdag cag gi yul gnod par mi 'gyur bar deng nyid du phye mar brlag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293a-5: de nas bdud sdig can dga' zhing mgu ste shin tu dga' bas spu'i khung bu khyab nas skad cig de nyid la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293a-6: bdud kyi sde chen pos bar snang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir khyab par byas te dung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293a-11: lcags kyi sil snyan dkrol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293a-12: rnga po che brdung zhing hu hu zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293a-13: pi tsi zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293a-15: sod cig sod cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing gshol dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293a-19: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293b-0: mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha lag na thogs shing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste skad cig de nyid la aa la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung @293b nas bcom ldan 'das la mtshon cha thams cad kyi char phab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293b-1: sangs rgyas kyi mthus mtshon cha de dag thams cad me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin chen po 'gyur par snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293b-2: bdud kyi sgra de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293b-5: yang dag par 'gro ba'i sgra rnams su grag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293b-7: zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bdag nyid bcings par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293b-8: de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ngo mtshar chen po de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' ba thob ste bcom ldan 'das de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293b-10: bdag nyid dgrol bar 'dod na 'grol ma nus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'gyel to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byams pa chen po'i thugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293b-13: thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i spyan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams thams cad du gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:293b-14: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294a-1: 'di 'khor gyi khyams 'di nas slong la stan la bzhag ste rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab par bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba gang gis bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'di dag dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294a-3: gzhan yang gang dag sdang ba bgegs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294a-13: zas su btsas pa za ba la sogs pa sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294a-14: rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma gus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa de dag thams cad gang gis 'dzud pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294a-17: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar byed pa yang ston cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294a-19: ngan 'gro'i log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294a-20: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-0: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas rin po che'i padma'i rdo rje'i stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu @294b gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i padma'i snying po la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-1: sems can kun gyi nyon mongs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-2: gzhig pa'i slad du 'dren par byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-3: khyod ni bdud rnams kun las rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-4: 'jig rten rtsa lag gcig pu khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-5: thar ba'i grong khyer 'jug pa'i lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-6: ye shes ma lus khyod gcig pus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-7: yang dag brnyes nas thugs rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-8: snyan pa'i gsung gis bstan pa mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-9: khyod sngon sbyin dang tshul khrims dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-10: bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-11: shes rab la sogs yon tan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-12: bdag mdzad slad kyis sems can btsud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-13: khyod kyis chos rnams skye med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-14: bshad cing de bzhin rnam phye yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-15: 'bras bur dogs pa ma mchis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-16: kye ma mgon po khyod kyis bshad 'khor lo yan lag bcu gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-17: khyod nyid mkhyen nas rab tu bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-18: mu stegs can dang bdud btul te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-19: chos kyi snang ba gsal bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-20: nyon mongs brag chen rnams kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-21: ye shes rdo rjes rab bcom nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-22: sus kyang thob par ma gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-23: byang chub bla na med pa brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:294b-24: gang gi mtshan yang rdzogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-2: khyod ni 'jig rten mchog gcig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-3: dam pa rab sbyin bdag po lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-4: khyod ni mgon po khyod ni pha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-5: khyod skyabs khyod ni dpung gnyen lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-6: thugs rje chen po ye shes nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-7: mya ngan 'das nas gcig pu khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-8: khyod nyid gshegs nas sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-9: sems can dmyal las rnam par dkrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-10: rang gi sku yang yongs btang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-11: khyod kyis srog chags rnams kyang bsrungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-12: lus can kun gyis ma thob pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-13: ye shes khyod kyis brnyes gyur nas; ;grol te 'jig rten rnams kyang grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-14: kye ma khyod ni rtsa lag bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-15: mgon po khyod kyi 'od zer gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-16: dra bas 'jig rten khams khyab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-17: mya ngan 'das las lhag pa bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-18: lus can kun gyis thob par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-19: khyod kyi 'od kyi gzis bcom pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-20: gza' rnams kun dang dgung zla dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-21: gdugs rnams dang ni zhugs rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-22: nor bu lam mer ma gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295a-23: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas yang rin po che'i padma'i snying po la 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295b-0: legs so zhes gsol nas rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen @295b po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295b-1: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295b-2: kun tu rab tu g-yos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295b-3: shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295b-4: nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'; lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295b-5: byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295b-7: 'og mtho na steng dma' bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295b-9: phyogs mtshams thams cad kyang dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295b-10: yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas lha ma me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295b-13: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje kun tu 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:295b-15: kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag byung bar kun tu snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296a-0: rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa ji snyed pa dag na sangs rgyas @296a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296a-1: bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te tshangs par spyod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296a-4: tha mar dge ba; don bzang po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296a-11: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gi 'khor gyi khyams rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag na kun tu snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spyan sngar rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba rgya chen po des snang bar gyur nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la so sor zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296a-15: snang ba rgya chen po kun tu gda' ba 'di su'i lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296a-16: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis so so'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab kyi steng na chos ston to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296b-0: bcom ldan 'das des bdud sdig can zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings te bcom ldan @296b 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel pa migs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la 'di skad du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296b-1: khyod kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston cig ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296b-4: rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296b-5: de'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296b-6: de skad ces bka' stsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis gnang nas rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296b-8: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:296b-11: dbu rgyan gyi sprin kyi sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297a-0: na bza'i sprin chen pos mchod pa chen po @297a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297a-1: byas nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i padma'i rdo rje'i stan la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das logs su lta zhing bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297a-2: de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas rang rang gi rin po che'i padma'i rdo rje'i stan de dag la 'khod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297a-3: de'i tshe shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje tog ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes te; 'di ltar rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di nyid las brtsams te chos kyang ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297a-4: rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297b-0: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des ngo mtshar de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag @297b par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba de la zhus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297b-2: rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297b-3: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad cing sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297b-6: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad mi gda' bar gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297b-13: mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul che zhing dbang che bar grags pa thams cad kyang kun nas mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297b-14: yid bde ba skyes te nub phyogs su mchi bar 'da' ba 'di su'i lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:297b-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298a-0: nub phyogs kyi logs na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na rdo rje chen po'i ri @298a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298a-1: rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298a-2: bcom ldan 'das des spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po phyung ste 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des 'jig rten gyi khams der bdud sdig can bskul ma thag tu kun tu khros nas lha'i bu thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298a-3: gzhan yang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298a-4: dpung gi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la gtse ba'i phyir lhags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298a-5: de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de nyid du zhags pa lnga'i bcing pas bcings nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298a-6: de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la ston cig par bka' lung byin nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje des rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje rnams bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298a-8: rdo rje de dag nyid rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298b-0: rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang phyogs bcu'i @298b 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa snang bar byas te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang bskul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298b-1: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang bskul bas ngo mtshar thob par gyur pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang so sor zhus so; ;rigs kyi bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298b-2: de nyid kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de'i spyan snga na 'dug cing bsnyen bkur byed pa yang mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298b-3: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:298b-6: bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299a-1: pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje de yang blta bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299a-2: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;rigs kyi bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299a-4: de'i dus la da bab par shes na song zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang lhan cig smra ba na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299b-0: bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa las grub pas @299b byin pa'i rin po che de dag las 'od zer 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299b-15: ke ke ru chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299b-19: go mu ta ra ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299b-20: mu tig dkar po'i kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299b-21: de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te steng gi ngar snang khyab par byas nas lha'i snang bas snang bar byas te 'dus nas 'ja' lta bur gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299b-22: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i zhabs mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299b-28: long bu gnyis kyi rtsa mi mngon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299b-29: padma gsar du kha phye ba lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:299b-36: chu srin ma ka ra'i mtshan dang ldan pa gnyis la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas nub par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-0: nam mkha'i dkyil na 'od zer re re'i rtse mo las padma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu @300a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-1: tshad shing ta'i 'phang lo tsam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-2: rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-3: gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-9: dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag mthon to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-10: de la gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'i padma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-11: aanda rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-13: dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-15: byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-17: shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-19: ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o; ;aanda rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'i padma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300a-20: dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300b-6: shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i padma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300b-13: aanda rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o; ;ze 'bru ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300b-14: dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300b-25: dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i padma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300b-26: gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300b-28: aanda rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300b-30: dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300b-32: byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300b-34: shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:300b-35: de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i padma dag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301a-0: rin po che'i padma re re la yang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu mdzes pa'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag ting nge 'dzin la @301a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301a-2: byang chub sems dpa' re re'i lte ba nas kyang 'od zer 'bum 'bum byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301a-3: 'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301a-4: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301a-5: shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i zla bas spras pa'i khang phran gyi rtse mo la seng+ge'i rna ba'i steng na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301a-7: rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dpyangs pas nam mkha' kun tu khebs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301a-14: ke ke ru las byas pa'i ka ba chen po'i klad la 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi shing las gcod pa lta bu'i tshogs bkod pas rnam par spras te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301a-16: dngul gyi las byas pa'i phug ron gyi phreng gi mtha' mu tig dmar po dang ldan pa'i dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba sbyangs pa'i sgras sad par gyur nas rab tu dga' zhing dregs pa'i phug ron dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301a-20: rma bya'i nga ro dag gis nyams dga' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301a-22: 'dun khang chen po'i nyen kor stegs pus bskor bas mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-0: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las @301b byas pa'i sgo khang can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-1: shel gyi rgyu las byas pa'i stegs bu dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-2: bkra shis kyi gser bum du ma nas chu dri zhim pos chag chag btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-3: rdzing chen po 'gram gyi ne'u gsing mrgad kyi rgyu las byung ba ka tsi lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde bas mdzes pa'i phyogs na bde bar nyal ba'i ngang pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-6: ka landa ka'i khyu gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-7: gser gyi phye ma bdal ba'i gtos chen po rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas kyis phreng bas brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-8: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba grangs 'bum phrag du mas kun nas yongs su bskor ba dag byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-9: rdzing bu re re nas kyang rin po che'i padma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rtsa dgu byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-10: rin po che'i padma re re'i snying po la yang sil snyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-12: glu dbyangs rnams kyi sgra byung bas lha'i bu mo dag gla len gar byed cing yongs su spyod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-15: glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ba de dag las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-16: sbyin dang tshul khrims kyis ni gang zhig dpag med cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:301b-17: de bzhin bzod dang brtson 'grus dag gi stobs ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-0: bsam gtan gyis ni zhi zhing dbang gos kun 'byor @302a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-1: ba; ;ye shes sgron ma de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-2: bsam gyis mi khyab stobs dang smon lam rnams dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-3: thabs dang byang chub yan lag ting 'dzin rnams kyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-4: rnam par grol ba'i lam dang stobs bcu ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-5: thub pa gang yin de la mchod phyir 'dong bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-6: 'dam rdzab nas ni padma rgyas pa ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-7: gang zhig nyon mongs 'dam gyis rtag par mi gos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-8: 'chi dang skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par bsal ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-9: rgyal ba 'jig rten mgon po de la blta phyir deng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-10: gcig kyang mi ldan min par gyur pa gang zhig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-11: skye rgu rnams kyi gti mug sgo glegs rnams bshig cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-12: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyod pa rab zhi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-13: sh'akya'i tog ldan de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-14: de ltar khang pa brtsegs pa dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-15: rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nam mkha'i dkyil na kun tu snang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-17: rin po che'i sprin gyi char 'bab par kun tu snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302a-18: kha cig tu ni; me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302b-0: gos kyi phreng ba'i @302b sprin gyi char /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302b-6: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i sprin gyi char /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302b-7: kha cig tu ni; me tog padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302b-14: ma h'a ka tsa li da dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302b-18: manydzu sha ka chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302b-20: mand'a ra ba chen po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302b-21: me tog gi char de dag las dri gang byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa gang dag gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rgyas par khyab bo; ;'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa de dag thams cad dri des mchog tu bde bas tshim zhing sems dga' bar gyur te sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral nas phan tshun 'dri ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302b-22: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:302b-23: de dag gis de mthong nas kyang phyag 'tshal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303a-0: skyes bu dam pa de la phyag 'tshal ma thag tu sems can gang dag ngan 'gro @303a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303a-1: log par ltung bar dong ba de dag kyang mchog tu bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303a-4: dad pa thob nas skad cig de nyid la ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las grol te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas bar snang la 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303a-5: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303a-6: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod nas lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje 'khor gyi khyams chen po thams cad ldan pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas lha rnams bar snang las babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang pa brtsegs pa dag na lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303a-11: tshul dang 'dra pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303a-12: gang slad ngan 'gro mchog tu sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-0: ming yang bde gshegs @303b stobs kyis deng du mi mjed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-1: bsod nams mi ldan sems can rnams la'ang rgyal ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-2: byams par mdzad pa kye ma ngo mtshar rmad du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-3: bdag cag rnams kyi rmongs pa'i snying gis bsgrubs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-4: sdig pa'i las gang shin tu bgyid dka' sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-5: de dag thub pa'i bya dags de ring glo bur du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-6: skad cig tu ni ji ltar rnam par zhig par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-7: ji ltar gdugs kyi mun pa mun nag kun bcom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-8: ji ltar zhugs 'bar bas ni ras rnams sreg pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-9: bser mas shing bal ltar yang sprin 'thor ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-10: de ltar 'gro ba'i sdig pa bde bar gshegs kyis bcom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-11: bde gshegs sras po mthong ngam thos sam dran gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-12: lhan cig skyes dbang 'od zer dra bas sdig 'phrog pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-13: 'gro ba yongs kyi srid pa'i spros pa zhig pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-14: thugs dang rtag tu ldan zhing skyo bar 'gyur mi mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-15: mig dang mgo dang snying dang sha khrag tshil rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-16: srog dang sdug dang bu rnams rtsva ltar bor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-17: mi mtshungs sems can don phyir thugs rjes thugs brlan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-18: 'jig rten mgon sras de dag rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-19: yi dvags ltogs la chu dang ro brgya'i zas rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:303b-20: de bzhin skye bo nor 'dod snying dang ldan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-0: thugs rje spyod cing rnam pa sna @304a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-2: byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog de la skyabs su mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-3: gang dag mnar med pa yang rab tu bsil mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-4: mchog tu tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'ang bsil bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-5: rang bde mi gzigs sams can brtson la thugs ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-6: 'jig rten mgon sras mnyam med de la phyag 'tshal lo; ;gang dag srid par 'khor ba'i srid pa'i skyon las grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-7: stong pa gsung yang las kyi 'bras bu mi 'dor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-8: ye shes me yis rnyog pa bsregs kyang thugs rjes brlan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-9: spyod pa brtag med dbang ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-10: kye ma dpal ldan rdo rje snying po bde gshegs sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-11: mtshan gyis mtshan btab sku las 'od stong mang byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-12: dri ba rnams dang sna tshogs glu yis bdag cag sim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-13: skad cig gis ni dmyal las sum cu'i lha dbang gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-14: bdag cag rnams kyis rgyal dang rgyal sras rnams dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-15: de dag rnams kyis gsungs pa mchog tu zhi chos la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-16: gus bstod dge ba rgya chen de ring gang thob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-17: des myur 'jig rten thams cad bde gshegs thob par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304a-18: de ltar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304b-0: de @304b dag rang rang khri rin po che'i gzhal med khang gi khang ba brtsegs pa rnams su 'khod de chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304b-2: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po rnams kyis mchod nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te bar snang las babs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas rin po che'i padma'i snying po la btsugs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la lta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:304b-5: rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lta'o; ;bltas nas kyang sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-1: 'phangs pa yi shes rab mda' mang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-2: ma 'phangs mthur ldan bdud bzhi pham mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-3: 'jig rten nyon mongs nyen pa'i mun pa gsal mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-4: bla ma sprin med zla ba bzhin du lhang nge 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-5: dam chos 'od mang gti mug bcom pa'i dra ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-6: 'dul ba'i padma'i gnas rnams kha phye nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-7: ye shes nam mkha' che la dri med 'bar ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-8: nyi ma ji bzhin gdung bar bgyi ba'i bdud sde gdungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-9: mu stegs can gyi nga rgyal mtha' dag pham mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-10: 'gro ba'i 'dod chags rab gdung ma lus rab zhi mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-11: dge ba'i lo tog rtsi chen yang dag 'phel mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-12: dge ba'i char pa phab cing 'brug ltar bsgrag tu gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-13: mgon po mu stegs can gyi wa brgya pham mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-14: bdud rnams bcom ste byang chub dam pa rab brnyes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-15: ma 'dres bsags pa'i bden pa'i stobs kyi mthu mnga' ba; ;skye ba'i 'jigs lam rab grol seng+ge ji bzhin sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-16: spyod ba zab cing brtan la brtags pas mi dpog pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-17: sems can gnas gyur stobs dang ting 'dzin nor bu bkram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-18: dri med chos lhun 'dul ba'i ri bo rnams 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305a-19: ye shes rgya mtsho mchog khyod skye rgu mchog gtso bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305b-0: tshul khrims bzang po'i rtsa ba sbyin @305b pa'i chus btab 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305b-1: byams dang bzod pa'i me tog yal ga 'khrungs pas mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305b-2: byang chub lam gyi yan lag 'bru chags 'dod byas bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305b-3: bsod nams dpag bsam shing khyod de ring ga las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305b-4: sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bar ba'i mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305b-5: dpe byad bzang mchog rin chen man shel gyis bskor cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305b-6: sa dang dbang dang dam chos phur pa brtan btab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:305b-7: lhun po bzhin du mi g-yo khyod ni 'gro la mdzes //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:308b-0: de nas @308b de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa du ma bstan pas gzhal med khang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:308b-8: rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan gyi sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:308b-16: 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi sprin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:308b-17: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:308b-18: rin po che'i padma du mas khebs pa'i gling gis legs par brgyan par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:308b-19: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa gzhal du med cing brjod du med par gtogs pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du legs par brgyan par kun tu snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @309a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309a-1: sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad de na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g-yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste 'jam zhing mnyen la rab tu gzhom zhing padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309a-2: yal ga gzhon sha chags shing 'jam pa'i sor mo'i ngos can gdugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309a-14: tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rgyu mthun pas mngon par grub pa'i dpe byad bzang pos rnam par spras pa; sen mo zangs 'dra zhing rgyas la snum zhing srab pa'i nor bu'i mdongs kyi me tog gi 'od zer gyis mkhrig ma mdzes par gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309a-15: sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309a-16: yang dag par mthun pa'i phyag rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309b-0: yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir spyi bo las byugs nas dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad cing 'di skad ces @309b kye rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir bdud sdig can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309b-1: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma dad cing sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309b-2: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa thams cad tshar gcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309b-4: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa sems zhum pa brtson 'grus brtan po ma yin pa'i go cha bgos pa rnams kyang yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309b-5: rab tu dga' bar bya ba nas khams gsum par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bar dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309b-8: dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir khyod rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309b-9: ye shes kyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsags pa yongs su rdzogs pas grub pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309b-14: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309b-15: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthu grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309b-16: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:309b-17: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nye bar zhi ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310a-3: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i dus kyi tsher ma ma lus par 'don pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310a-15: dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i 'khor mngon par dga' ba can dag la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dga' ba du ma kun tu skyed pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310a-16: legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310a-17: de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gzengs bstod de rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas rang rang gis phyag bskum ste rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos nyan du gzung ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bkye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310a-18: de dag gis gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310b-0: byang chub @310b sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos ji tsam du skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310b-1: brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyi skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rin po che'i padma'i snying po dag la phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa'i bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas de'i tshe gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310b-3: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310b-4: bdud sdig can 'di rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings pa 'di las khrol la ci nas kyang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310b-5: chos la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310b-6: dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310b-7: gzhan yang gang dag lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310b-16: mi ma yin gang dag ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs nas kyang ci nas khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:310b-18: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:311a-1: ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:311a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas yang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:311a-4: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:311a-14: kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:311b-3: lag pa stong phrag du ma la rdo rje dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-5: drag po ki li ki li la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-6: dmar po ki li ki li la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-7: byis pa ki li ki li la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-11: rims thams cad med par mdzod cig sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-12: de nas rdo rje khro bo chen pos 'di skad smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-13: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos te phyogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-15: de bzhin du bar snang la rdo rje'i skar mda' chen po'i be con 'bab par snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-16: gnam grum pa'i sgra chen po yang grag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-17: kun nas sa chen po 'di grum par kun tu snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-18: sa chen po'i ser ka de dag nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun gyen du byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-19: chu'i rgyun de dag gis rnam par 'jigs pa'i dus kyi chu bzhin du sa chen po thams cad kun tu gang bar snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-20: gang dag sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i klu chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317a-22: lha ma yin chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317b-0: de dag thams cad kyang sa'i 'og nas thon cing ri rab kyi drung du thon te gyen du byung @317b nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317b-1: de nas drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317b-2: sdang ba sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i 'byung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317b-4: log 'dren gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang kun tu 'bar /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317b-5: rab tu 'bar zhing kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag gis rang rang gi lus kun tu rnam par 'joms par shes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317b-6: de dag sdug bsngal mi bzad cing drag la rtsu ba pas nyen nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i du skad bton te tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317b-8: bdag cag skad cig gis srog kyang ma mchis par 'gyur du bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317b-9: 'jigs pa chen por lhung ba 'di las yongs su bskyab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317b-11: log 'dren rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad na gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317b-23: gtsug lag khang zhig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:317b-25: lha khang na gnas pa dag thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa chen po ltung ba 'di las yongs su bskyab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-1: gsol zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-2: de bzhin du lha'i khang pa thams cad g-yos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-4: kun tu rab tu g-yos te mog mog por gyur cing 'od med par kun tu snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-5: bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyang kun tu 'bar zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-6: kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-7: gang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje khro bo chen pos sngangs skrag te rang rang gi mgo rdo rje rnams kyis rnam par 'joms pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-8: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-9: bdud sdig can yang shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bas nyam thag cing skrag la zhum ste gnod pas sdangs nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-11: dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-12: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-13: khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-14: rigs kyi bu dag yongs su skyobs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318a-16: bdag nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318b-2: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir pha lta bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318b-6: snag gi gnyen mtshams lta bur 'gyur bar byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318b-7: bdag deng phyin chad sems can thams cad kyi pha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318b-11: snag gi gnyen mtshams su 'gyur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318b-14: yid kyi las cung zad gang ci byed pa de sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318b-15: bdag dbugs phyung nas gzhan yang dbugs dbyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318b-16: bdag grol nas gzhan yang dgrol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318b-17: bdag mya ngan las 'das nas gzhan yang mya ngan las bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318b-23: srog gis kyang sems can thams cad la rim gror bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:318b-31: bla ma'i gnas thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-0: de nas bdud sdig can gyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bzung ste byang @319a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-1: chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-2: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te dga' ba thob nas sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-3: gang gi phyir na bdud khyod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-4: sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-5: bla med byang chub sems bskyed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-6: bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-7: rin chen sems 'dis mi ring bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-8: rnam 'dren sangs rgyas gyur nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-9: sems can shin tu sdug bsngal kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-10: mya ngan las ni bzla bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-11: rgyal ba'i mchog 'di ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-12: skye rgu thams cad gdul bar byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-13: stobs po che dang ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-14: bdud bzhi po dag gdul bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-15: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-16: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de sangs rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi lag gi snyim pa nas me tog gi phur ma thogs pa shes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-17: me tog gi phur ma de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-18: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-19: khro bo chen po rdo rje'i khro bo de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-0: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems @319b dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la gtor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-1: de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog gi gzhal med khang chen por gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-3: mchog tu bde bas tshim par gyur nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgom zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su sems pas mdun du rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag bsam gyi shing du mas mig mang ris brgyad du bres pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-16: ke ke ru chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-21: 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi dra bas rnam par spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-25: rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan bsgrengs pas legs par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-26: me tog phreng bas klubs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-27: pog snod du ma nas bdug pa dri zhim po'i ngad kyis dri zhim par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-28: phye ma dri zhim po'i bsgo bas bsgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-29: lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma sil snyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:319b-31: glu len cing gar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-0: rdzing bu yan lag brgya dang ldan pa'i chu can @320a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-1: 'bum phrag du ma'i dbus nas rin po che sna tshogs padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-5: dri mchog byung bas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs dang ldan pa byung nas de mchog tu dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-7: yid bde ba skyes pa de gus pa thams cad kyis de blangs nas bdud kyi mthu chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-8: bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-9: bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos lag pa gnyi gas spyi bo la blangs te dge ba'i bshes gnyen gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-11: tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-12: 'jig rten dag la dbang byed dbang gis 'byor gyur pa; ;stobs bcu'i sras rab mchog ldan khyod la brten nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-13: byang chub phyir ni chags bral dri med byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-14: sems can bde sgrub gter dang 'dra ba bdag gis thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-15: bdag mig gti mug mun pas dri can dri med gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-16: srid pa'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi zhing spros dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-17: mya ngan 'das pa'i drang po'i lam ni bdag la bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-18: sems dmyal mi bzad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320a-19: sdig bral 'jig rten mgon la skyabs su ma song ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-0: kye ma dman pa yun ring ji lta bslus @320b shig gu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-1: de ring thub dbang sras po rnams la bsod nams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-2: dad dang snying rje ting 'dzin thob nas ngo mtshar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-3: sa mdog gcig pur sangs rgyas myur du grub par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-4: gcig pus 'gro ba ma lus mya ngan bzla bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-5: srid pa gzhan na kun tu rgyu tshe bdag gi yid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-6: rang phan 'jug dang dge bshes bral bar ma gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-7: de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mngon par bstod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to; ;de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-12: log 'dren de dag thams cad gang gis sems can thams cad la rnam par rtsom pa rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-14: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig 'dzin du chug cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-16: 'di dag la mi 'jigs pa yang byin cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-17: des sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-20: mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:320b-21: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321a-0: khro bo chen po rdo rje @321a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321a-1: khro bo de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes te tshig la mngon par dga' nas yang lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321a-8: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321a-22: sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321a-23: gdon gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po mang po 'bab pas dkrugs pa'i mtsho chen po zab mo klong 'khyil ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321a-24: 'ur 'ur sgra phyung ba lta bur drag cing rgyun ring ba'i skad gsang mthon pos 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321a-28: log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321a-29: sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321a-30: sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa khyed thams cad nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321a-31: khyed kyis dang phan chad sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan par zhugs pa dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321b-0: de la @321b sogs pa gang dag gsang sngags sgrub bam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321b-1: klog pa de dag la bgegs 'byung bar mi bya zhing 'che bar mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321b-2: sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun par stobs sbyin par bya'o; ;sems can gang dag dam tshig la ma zhugs pa de dag la bsrung bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321b-8: rig sngags 'grub par sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321b-15: mi bgrungs pa rnams kyi sha dang zas zos kyang skyon du [?] mi gzung zhing nyes par mi brtsi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321b-16: de nas sdang ba 'byung po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321b-18: log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad ces bya ba nas sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321b-20: bka' lung ci stsal ba de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321b-21: deng slan chad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321b-24: sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:321b-25: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo chen po dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-2: gdon gyi tshogs de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-5: phyag rgya thams cad 'dzin du bcu go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-6: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha radv'a ti'i bus gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-9: gang la gnas nas khyed kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di bstan pam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-10: bdud sdig can yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-11: gzhan yang sdang ba gdon dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-14: log 'dren thams cad dam tshig la bkod cing byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du bcug pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-15: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-16: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-17: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-21: sgra skad kyis rtogs par bya ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322a-29: ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i chos de gang yang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-0: @322b gang la ming med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-4: mnyam par gzhag pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-5: g-yeng ba med pa 'di btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya zhes de la ji snyam du sems /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-6: yang btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-8: bdag la gsal par byed pa ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-9: gzhan la gsal bar byed pa ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-10: gnyi ga la gsal bar byed pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-11: 'on kyang gsal bar byed par btags pa yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-12: de la gsal bar byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-13: gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid kyis stong /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-16: gzhan yang gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis stong /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-17: gnyi ga yang gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyis stong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-18: yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu btags pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-19: 'di ci zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi tshig kyang tshig gis bdag nyid kyis stong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-20: yi ge yang yi ge ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-21: de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don rtogs par byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-22: don de brjod pa na yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-23: gang du yang mi 'gro mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-24: gzhan gyi dbang la brten pa'i phyir yi ger btags pa yang yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:322b-25: yongs su btags pa yin pa'i phyir btags pa yang stong pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:323a-0: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi @323a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:323a-2: rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang stong pa'o //
