K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328a-21: ye shes goms pa rnal 'byor du gyur pa'i rgyud kyi rgyun mi bcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-0: skal pa yod la yongs su ma smin pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa'i don gyi phyir phyogs tsam gyi sgo gcig mdun du byas te @328b 'jug par byed pa cung zad cig bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-1: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-2: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a rdva ti'i bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-3: mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du byung bar gyur te dga' ba thob nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smros so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-6: gang gi phyir kho bo cag lta bu'i nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyis sgra bsgrags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i nyan thos rnams la chos zab mo'i tshig gi don 'di lta bu gsal bar byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-9: lag na rdo rjes smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-10: btsun pa sh'a rdva ti'i bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-12: ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-13: btsun pa sh'a rdva ti'i bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-14: ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes de skad zer ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-15: ting nge 'dzin 'di ming rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g-yas pa gser gyi kha dog brkyang ste phyag g-yas pa 'jam zhing mnyen la shin tu gzhon sha chags pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag ste ched du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:328b-17: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329a-0: khyod kyis gang mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di gsang ba pa'i tshig gi don bzhin du sems can thams cad la lung bstan cing bshad de dkrol @329a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329a-1: zhing rnam par phye ba legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas lag na rdo rje la ji ltar legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la phyag bzhag ste ched du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal cing legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329a-4: chos kyi rnam grangs 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na ming 'dzin pa yang dkon na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329a-5: rab tu gsal bar byed pa lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329a-6: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu gang+g'a'i klung tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul las shin tu 'das pa snyed chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329a-20: mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-0: mi skye @329b ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-1: de bas kyang ches mang ba'i sems can rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-2: phyir mi ldog pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-3: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-4: de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dpag tu med cing grangs med la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-5: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang chos kyi dgab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-6: mchod pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na rnga rnams ma brdungs par kun nas sgra byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su kun nas sil snyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-9: glu dbyangs blangs pas lha'i bu mo rnams gar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-18: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-20: mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-27: pa ri sha ka chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:329b-31: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330a-3: kun nas skyes chen po'i me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas mngon par bab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330a-4: spos chu'i char gyi sprin yang mngon par bab bo; ;de nas tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330a-13: ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330a-29: sa'i lha la sogs pa sdang ba gdon bgegs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330a-31: de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330a-33: mi ma yin pa dag bla gos rnams phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330a-34: gang gis bdag cag gzir cing nye bar gzir bas rig sngags 'chang thams cad la dngos grub stsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-0: dam tshig thams cad @330b 'dzin du 'jug pa la yang dag par gnang bar bgyid par 'gyur ba rang gi snying po 'di bdag cag la bstan du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-3: gang gi phyir khyed cag 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-5: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-6: ngas khyed rang rang gi snying po bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-7: de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rnga bo che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-11: sprin chen po'i sgra lta bu'i gsung tshangs pa chen po'i sgra bas lhag pa sna tshogs pa snyan cing rgya che la zab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-15: sems can thams cad kyi snying du 'thad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-21: brjod pa'i tshig khams gsum pa thams cad la go bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng+ge'i sgra bla na med pa des grub pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:330b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-12: sarba buddha aa dhi shthi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-15: shri ye ma h'a shri ye sarba aad bhu ta ya shri ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-17: padma m'a li ni badzra aang+ku shi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-20: sh'u li ni badzra dha re; hi hi hi hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-33: ba la ba la; ra la ra la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-45: tha ra tha ga ge tha re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-48: grub pa'i tshogs kyis phyag byas ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-49: lha thams cad kyi snying kun tu 'jug par byed ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-50: sems can thams cad kyi snying 'bigs ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-51: sdang ba rab tu sdang ba thams cad kyi snying 'joms ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-52: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rjes su skyong ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-53: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po la 'jug mtshur shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-54: dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331a-55: sems can thams cad kyi snying rnams khug la dam tshig la khod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331b-0: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal @331b lo sv'ah'a; 'jig rten mkhyen pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331b-7: tshangs pa la sv'ah'a; khyab 'jug la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331b-10: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331b-16: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331b-26: lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331b-27: srin po la sogs pa khams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331b-29: dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331b-42: bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:331b-43: de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-0: lha thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'jigs sngangs skrag par gyur nas chu shing gi tshal rlung drag @332a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-1: po chen pos bskyod de rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du g-yo zhing 'gul la snying tshig ste rdo rje'i phur bus btab pa bzhin du zugs shing zhigs la 'gre zhing skyabs btsal ba'i phyir 'du shes tsam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'bod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-5: ngas dam tshig 'di yongs su 'dzin du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-6: rig sngags grub 'byor bar byed pa'i snying po la gzhol ba bsgrags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-7: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-8: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsang ba pa'i snying po 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad bslang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-9: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-10: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-12: badzra k'i li k'i la ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-15: bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-16: rig sngags thams cad 'grub par bgyid pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332a-18: bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis ma btang bar mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332b-0: @332b bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par bshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332b-1: sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332b-2: 'byung po thams cad rnam par bshig par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332b-3: nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332b-4: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332b-7: bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa chen po bgyid pa na gnod pa bgyid pa bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis rnam par gtses pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin me ltar blos rnam par bsgyings shing rnam par rol pa mngon shes dri zhim snang dpal gyis bdag la bsrung ba'i slad du stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332b-8: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu 'khor de thams cad bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332b-9: bde bas tshim par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332b-10: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstan pa la gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:332b-13: khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-0: @333a *// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-1: des sems can mang po la yun ring por phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-3: tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bla na med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-5: sgrib pa med pa thob cing rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-6: su chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-9: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-10: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-16: sems pa de ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-17: 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-18: rigs dma' ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-19: dbul po'i rigs rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-20: shes rab med pa yang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-22: tshe thung bar ma yin zhing tshe rabs tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-23: byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-25: rab tu dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333a-26: 'khor ngan pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-0: tshig @333b gzung bar 'os shing snyan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-1: skal pa bzang zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-2: shes rab chen po dang spobs pa chen po dang dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-5: sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-6: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-7: sems can thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing che zhing mtha' yas pa la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-9: nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du de byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-25: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-26: de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-27: nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:333b-28: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-2: de la lha thams cad kyang srung zhing sbed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-4: de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang sla bar 'gyur ro; ;'jig rten pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-6: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig la zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-9: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-13: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du bstan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrib pa med pa bskor ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-16: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-17: bdud kyi phyogs 'dul ba zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-18: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334a-19: dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334b-2: dam tshig thams cad la rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334b-3: lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334b-4: rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334b-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334b-6: zhes gsol te mngon par dga' nas cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334b-7: de nas byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334b-18: mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-004:334b-19: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
